summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of North Seventy-third Street from Greenwood Avenue to Fush Avenue Northwest et al in the co, by laying watermains under Ordinance No. 21614, creating Local Improvement District No. 2155 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
